{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
{-# LANGUAGE Rank2Types #-}
{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
-- | Bingings to libnotify library
module System.Libnotify
  ( -- * Libnotify
    -- ** Types
    -- $notify_types
    TagIO, LNI, NI(..)
  , module System.Libnotify.Types
    -- ** Notification management
    -- $notify_management
  , notify, render, close
    -- ** Simpler combinators
    -- $notify_simpler
  , oneShot
    -- ** Update notification text and/or icon
    -- $notify_update_primary
  , update, setSummary, setText, setIcon, setIconFromPixbuf, setImageFromPixbuf
    -- ** Update notification miscellaneous parameters
    -- $notify_update_secondary
  , setTimeout, setUrgency, setCategory
  , addHint, unsetHints, addAction, unsetActions
  , Hint(..)
  ) where

import Control.Monad (mplus)
import Control.Concurrent.MVar (MVar, newMVar, modifyMVar_)
import Data.Word (Word8)

import Control.Lens
import Control.Monad.IO.Class (MonadIO, liftIO)
import Data.ByteString (ByteString)
import Data.Default
import Data.Proxy
import Data.Reflection
import Data.Tag
import Graphics.UI.Gtk.Gdk.Pixbuf (Pixbuf)

import           System.Libnotify.Internal (Notification)
import qualified System.Libnotify.Internal as I
import           System.Libnotify.Types


-- $notify_types

-- | Tagged IO type. Saves a bit of typing
type TagIO s a = forall m. MonadIO m => Tag s m a

-- | Abstract libnotify object token + data
data LNI = LNI
  { pointer      :: Notification -- ^ Pointer to notification object in libnotify
  , notification :: MVar NI      -- ^ Notification data
  }

-- | libnotify object data (typically associated with token)
data NI = NI
  { summary :: Maybe String -- ^ Notification summary
  , text    :: Maybe String -- ^ Notification text
  , icon    :: Maybe String -- ^ Notification icon name
  }

instance Default NI where
  def = NI { summary = Nothing, text = Nothing, icon = Nothing }


-- $notify_management

-- | Work with notification inside passed action
notify :: MonadIO m
       => String       -- ^ summary
       -> Maybe String -- ^ text
       -> Maybe String -- ^ icon
       -> (forall s. Reifies s LNI => TagIO s a)
       -> m a
notify s t i c = create >>= \lni -> reify lni (untag . asProxyOf c)
 where
  create = io $ do
    unlessM I.initialized (I.initNotify "haskell-libnotify") -- Nobody cares about repeated initializations
    n  <- I.newNotify s t i
    ni <- newMVar (NI (Just s) t i)
    return $ LNI n ni

  asProxyOf = const :: Tag s m a -> Proxy s -> Tag s m a

-- | Render notification
render :: forall s. Reifies s LNI => TagIO s ()
render = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.showNotify . pointer

-- | Close notification
close :: forall s. Reifies s LNI => TagIO s ()
close = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.closeNotify . pointer


-- $notify_simpler

-- | One time notification
oneShot :: MonadIO m
        => String       -- ^ summary
        -> Maybe String -- ^ text
        -> Maybe String -- ^ icon
        -> m ()
oneShot t i c = notify t i c render
{-# INLINE oneShot #-}


-- $notify_update_primary

-- | Update notification
update :: forall s. Reifies s LNI
       => NI -> TagIO s ()
update NI { summary = s, text = t, icon = i } = do
  lni <- reflectedM
  -- 'modifyMVar_' is safe here since no other \"producers\" are there
  io $ modifyMVar_ (notification lni) $ \(NI (mplus s -> s') (mplus t -> t') (mplus i -> i')) -> do
    I.updateNotify (pointer lni) (view _Just s') t' i'
    return (NI s' t' i')

-- | Update notification summary
setSummary :: forall s. (Reifies s LNI) => String -> TagIO s ()
setSummary s = update def { summary = Just s }

-- | Update notification text
setText :: forall s. (Reifies s LNI) => String -> TagIO s ()
setText t = update def { text = Just t }

-- | Update notification icon name
setIcon :: forall s. (Reifies s LNI) => String -> TagIO s ()
setIcon i = update def { icon = Just i }


-- $notify_update_secondary

-- | Sets notification 'Timeout'.
setTimeout :: Reifies s LNI => Timeout -> TagIO s ()
setTimeout t = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.setTimeout t . pointer

-- | Sets notification 'Category'.
setCategory :: Reifies s LNI => Category -> TagIO s ()
setCategory c = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.setCategory c . pointer

-- | Sets notification 'Urgency'.
setUrgency :: Reifies s LNI => Urgency -> TagIO s ()
setUrgency u = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.setUrgency u . pointer

-- | Sets notification icon from pixbuf
setIconFromPixbuf :: Reifies s LNI => Pixbuf -> TagIO s ()
setIconFromPixbuf p = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.setIconFromPixbuf p . pointer

-- | Sets notification image from pixbuf
setImageFromPixbuf :: Reifies s LNI => Pixbuf -> TagIO s ()
setImageFromPixbuf p = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.setImageFromPixbuf p . pointer

-- | Adds 'Hint' to notification.
addHint :: (Hint a, Reifies s LNI) => String -> a -> TagIO s ()
addHint s h = reflectedM >>= void . io . setHint s h

-- | Removes hints from notification.
unsetHints :: Reifies s LNI => TagIO s ()
unsetHints = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.clearHints . pointer

-- | Adds action to notification.
addAction :: Reifies s LNI => String -> String -> (Notification -> String -> IO ()) -> TagIO s ()
addAction a l c = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.addAction a l c . pointer

-- | Removes actions from notification.
unsetActions :: Reifies s LNI => TagIO s ()
unsetActions = reflectedM >>= void . io . I.clearActions . pointer

-- | 'Hint' is a (server-dependent) setting for a notification.
class Hint a where
  setHint :: String -> a -> LNI -> IO ()

instance Hint Int where
  setHint k v = I.setHintInt32 k (fromIntegral v) . pointer

instance Hint Double where
  setHint k v = I.setHintDouble k v . pointer

instance Hint [Char] where
  setHint k v = I.setHintString k v . pointer

instance Hint Word8 where
  setHint k v = I.setHintByte k v . pointer

instance Hint ByteString where
  setHint k v = I.setHintByteArray k v . pointer


-- * Auxilliary functions

-- | Proper 'void' with 'Monad'ic context
void :: Monad m => m a -> m ()
void m = m >> return ()

-- | 'Monad'ic version of 'unless'
unlessM :: Monad m => m Bool -> m a -> m ()
unlessM mbool ma = do
  bool <- mbool
  if bool
    then return ()
    else ma >> return ()

-- | Easier to type alias for 'liftIO'
io :: MonadIO m => IO a -> m a
io = liftIO
